Sourcecode in the url

normally you go on a website and by right click you can choose to see the source code. Or you just use firebug and select an element you want to analyse. Is it possible to write the source code in the URL so that it wouldn't be shown by right click + choosing or selecting an element? I'm asking because I've already seen this phenomenon once by using an iphone simulator in safari. Any ideas or hints what I'm exactly looking for? Your help would be great. Edit: Based on wrong information. You can see the sourcecode by rightclicking. But the url still contains all information about the site. I'll get back to you as soon as I got more information to write them down clearly. Sorry for all the confusion.
